{"id":1053152643,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1695092340,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1053152643/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Multiply Strings","memory":"6.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string multiply(string num1, string num2) {\n        int len1 = num1.length(), len2 = num2.length();\n        string res(len1 + len2, '0');\n        \n        for (auto i = len1 - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\n            for (auto j = len2 - 1; j >= 0; j--) {\n                int diff = (num1[i] - '0') * (num2[j] - '0') + (res[i+j+1] - '0');\n                res[i + j + 1] = diff % 10 + '0';\n                res[i + j] += diff / 10;\n            }\n        }\n\n        for (auto i = 0; i < res.length(); i++) {\n            if (res[i] != '0')\n                return res.substr(i);\n        }\n\n        return \"0\";\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"multiply-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
